```{r include = FALSE}
# Scatterplot
```
```{r 11-scatterplot}
ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)
) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = cyl, y = hwy)
) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = hwy, y = cty)
) +
  geom_point()
```
